title: 820-3332 graphics issue
message:
i have this board, it does not have any liquid damage and the screen will turn off if i move or flex the machine little bit,  i haven't seen this problem before so don't know where to begin with.
where should i start first?

title: 820-3332 graphics issue
message: I reflowed gmux chip and it seems to work fine for now

title: 820-3332 graphics issue
message:
Usually U8900 generates black screen and flickers.
It may got some heat from GMUX and works now.
I still recommend you to reflow it...
